docs.title: Release notes
docs.text: GoodCloud platform is committed to providing users with comprehensive and high-quality services. Our team is dedicated to continuously improving and enhancing the user experience to ensure that you have the best possible experience. Thank you for choosing our platform, and we look forward to serving you better in the future.

docs.title: New Features
docs.text: • A new API Integration feature has been added, users can use this feature to call GoodCloud platform interfaces. (Please actively contact us if you would like to try this feature).

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text: • Fixed an occasional pop-up reset problem when users perform an advanced search. It now works correctly.

docs.title: Security Updates
docs.text: • Optimized global rate limiting to improve the security of platform interface calls.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: New Features
docs.text:
• Added a new platform maintenance page, allowing you to know the maintenance and deployment status of the platform on time.
  • Added a new customizable session duration feature. You can set the session expiration time in the VAR/Organization Settings menu bar to avoid the account exit from the platform during operation.

docs.title: Feature Enhancements
docs.text:
• Optimized the display of the Remote Connect button on the Device Details page. You can use the Access Device Terminal and Access Web Admin Panel buttons to remotely access the device.
  • Improved the design of the Brand Customization feature to meet the needs of multi-regional brand customization.
  • Optimized the login logic of entering the security interface to avoid repeated operations by users.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text: • Fixed the Self-view Bound Device interface export function, the table header and device information can be matched properly now.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Feature Enhancements
docs.text: • Optimized performance of platform interfaces to improve page loading and response time. We will continue to optimize the responsiveness of the interface in iterative releases to improve your user experience.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text:
• Minor UI, functionality, and stability fixes.
    • Set a new standard for Device status UI display:
      • Online: Green.
      • Offline: Gray.
      • Inactive: Orange.
    • Adjusted the text display of alert messages (including initial capitalization, etc.)
    • Added units for values (RSRP, RSSI, RSRQ, and SINR).
    • The display of the Device Details page has been customized, and we will continue to improve the customizability of the page.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text:
• Fixed the issue where invitation emails were not displayed according to brand customization when calling the third-party API. Invitation emails will now be sent using the correct brand-customized email.
  • Resolved the exception that occurred when configuring device groups.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: New Features
docs.text: • Users can now customize their time zone settings for their accounts. The platform portal will dynamically adjust displayed and set times based on the user's selected time zone.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text: • Minor UI, functionality, and stability fixes.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Feature Enhancements
docs.text:
• Optimized prompt information when moving devices to the device group.
  • Enhanced platform interface performance to improve page loading and response speed.
  • Improved stability of the Brand Customization feature.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text: • Minor UI, functionality, and stability fixes.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text:
• Fixed the issue with some devices where status shown on GoodCloud platform did not match actual status.
  • Fixed the issue with some devices showing 'Deactivated' status despite being connected to the GoodCloud platform.
  • Minor UI, functionality, and stability fixes.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text:
• Fixed the issue with the Re-activate feature not working properly, ensuring that devices can communicate with the cloud platform successfully.
  • Minor UI, functionality, and stability fixes.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text:
• Fixed a problem where deleting a device from the cloud platform would result in an error message.
  • Minor UI, functionality, and stability fixes.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Feature Enhancements
docs.text: • VAR-created organizations can now utilize the API Integrations feature, which is primarily designed for cloud-to-cloud integration scenarios.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text: • Fixed the issue where API Logs were not displaying correctly.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text: • Fixed the issue where VAR members were experiencing errors when trying to create organizations. Users can now create sub-organizations successfully by assigning them roles with Organization Management permissions.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Feature Enhancements
docs.text: • For the cloud integration business scenario, third-party interface calls are now allowed at up to 500 calls per minute to meet customers' increased demand for information interaction.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text: • Fixed the issue where VAR members were experiencing errors when trying to manage organizations.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: New Features
docs.text: • Introducing a new log module in GoodCloud, allowing users to access historical operation records on the platform.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text:
• Rectified the issue where the unit values for signal strength in the cellular module were not displaying on the device details page.
  • Minor UI, functionality, and stability fixes.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text: • Resolved a registration error for users signing up for a cloud platform account via invitation links.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.

docs.title: New Features
docs.text:
• A new tag management feature has been added to the VAR view, allowing users to monitor tag usage and manage tags in batches.
  • Added GooCloud Online Docs, which is currently only available to VAR & ORG users.

docs.title: Feature Enhancements
docs.text:
• Optimized the Ping/Trace function and added a new function entry in the Command action group of the Device List.
  • Dashboard map display optimization.
  • For individual users, we have decided to disable the Setting Template feature, which is only available for VAR/ORG.

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text: • Fixed the bug that users would display The device is bound by xxx on 0-0-0 0:0 in the router admin panel. Now you will see the exact device binding time.

docs.title: Security Updates
docs.text: • Optimized permission control of Notification logs in the Organization view to prevent unauthorized situations.

docs.title: Known Issues
docs.text: • Fixed the issue that the actual online/offline status of some devices does not match the status of the devices displayed on the GoodCloud; If the above issue occurs in your device, please actively contact us.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.
